attributes.action: Have Steve Staunton, current irish manager, sacked form his position.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe he should be sacked as the man has tarnished the good name of irish football. He is tactically inept and disgrace that a man with no experience is given such important position. While im ere i would like Robbie Keane and John O'Shea sacked too.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
